import React, { Component } from 'react'; import "./App.css"; import Cleave from "cleave.js/react"; const normalizeCardNumber = (value) => { return value.replace(/\s/g, "").match(/.{1,4}/g).join(" ").substr(0, 19) || "" } export class App extends Component { render() { return

URFU Payment

{ const { value } = event.target event.target.value = normalizeCardNumber(value) } } />
} } export default App;
